New Records: Virat Kohli broke the record for the highest number of sixes in a T20I match
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh removed two key Netherlands players in successive balls
Bhuvneshwar Kumar broke through with a crucial wicket
Rohit Sharma fell after a half-century
KL Rahul was dismissed early in the innings
Pre-Game Insights: India made no changes to their XI after their win against Pakistan
Netherlands were aiming to perform well against a strong Indian side
Post-Match Reflections: India's win moved them to the top of Group 2
The match was significant for India's progress towards their first title since 2007
Netherlands struggled to chase down a big total
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match's significance in the group stage
Virat Kohli and Suryakumar Yadav's performances were crucial
The competitiveness of the game was evident throughout
